text: when you walk about Central Park whether
it's daytime nighttime you just feel
like you're not in New York City could
you believe that such a rustic wool
settings right here and the most heavily
populated urban mass in North America my
name is Curtis sliwa and we are the
guardian angels the guardian angels is a
citizen safety patrol unique in the fact
that we carry no weapons have no special
powers and privileges but we make
citizens arrests we physically intervene
in many ways New York City led in the
tremendous uptick in violent crime in
the 70s and 80s we began patrolling
Central Park soon after we started our
subway safety patrol which is what we're
most famous for in New York City and now
in other cities around the world
recently we began patrolling the park
again at the end of spring beginning of
summer there are two specific areas of
the park the rambles and what they call
the great hill in the ravine in which
crimes are being committed on a regular
basis people were flooding us with phone
calls so people use the park on a
regular basis I spent a week in the park
because I know this look like the back
of my amp I myself before I made that
decision and I saw a noticeable
difference the number of crimes
particularly then involved assault and
robbery at night and skyrocketed the
police certainly don't want us here
because they take it as if it's a
suggestion that they're not doing their
job tough noogies they're not the cops
don't want to get out of the cars they
don't want to get on mountain bikes they
don't want to go undercover they don't
want to go up these hills they don't

professionals you ought to be aggressive
you ought to want to go into the areas
where crimes are taking place so you can
deter crime and where necessary help

and they know that with proper policing
the guardian angels would not be needed
in Central Park so don't blame the
messengers because you don't like the

to preserve the nature of what this Park
has been like since it was first built
more than a century ago it was a place
where you were going to come and seek
relief from
urban grind there are few in the world
like Central Park and that's why if it
becomes a place where you won't go
because of public safety concerns that
would be a disgrace brooch is an

Preppers are people who feel as if
